lines.text: In 1864 when Lincoln declared all men free and equal, did he, or did he not, include husbands?
Mrs. Harry Higgins believed the question "How to handle husbands" should be settled by Women's Clubs - Hickory preferred.
The first step in losing any man is letting him have his own way!
Harry Higgins, just a crumb from the sponge cake of Life.
Get that worried look off your face, and they'll never know you're married.
It's all my fault - I should never have given you that dime!
